column1: BBC News NI outlines the latest data on coronavirus and Covid-19 vaccinations across Northern Ireland and the Republic of Ireland.Eleven Covid-19-related deaths have been reported in Northern Ireland on Monday.Deaths are measured by recording those who died within 28 days of receiving a positive result in a test for coronavirus.The total number of deaths linked to Covid-19 in Northern Ireland since the start of the pandemic is 2
column3: 028 cases of coronavirus were reported on Monday
column5: 035 cases recorded on Sunday.That includes cases confirmed from samples taken in recent days

column9: down from 380 on Friday.There were 44 patients with Covid-19 in hospital intensive care units
column10: up from 43 on Friday.Last updated 8 November at 14:10 GMTSource: Department of Health Northern IrelandA total of 2
